Lex Barker https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lex_Barker 0 Alexander Crichlow "Lex" Barker Jr. (May 8, 1919 – May 11, 1973) was an American actor best known for playing Tarzan of the Apes and leading characters from Karl May's novels. Alexander_Crichlow_"_Lex_"_Barker_Jr. ( May_8_,_1919 – May_11_,_1973 ) was an_American_actor best_known for playing Tarzan of the_Apes and leading characters from Karl_May 's_novels .
